title: ROSE IN CHAINS
author: Julie Soto
description: After the dark forces win the war, Evermore's princess, Briony Rosewood, is auctioned off to a member of a family known for its viciousness.

title: THE IRRESISTIBLE URGE TO FALL FOR YOUR ENEMY
author: Brigitte Knightley
description: Aurienne Fairhrim accepts an offer to heal a member of an enemy faction and an attraction develops.

title: ONE GOLDEN SUMMER
author: Carley Fortune
description: A photographer returns to a place where she spent a summer as a teenager and runs into the guy she had a crush on back then.

title: THE WOMAN IN SUITE 11
author: Ruth Ware
description: The second book in the Lo Blacklock series. Blacklock attends the opening of a luxury Swiss hotel and gets swept up in a dangerous pursuit across Europe.

title: ATMOSPHERE
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
description: In the summer of 1980, Joan Goodwin begins training with a group of candidates for NASA’s space shuttle program.

title: BUTLER
author: Salena Zito
description: A firsthand account of the attempted assassination of Donald Trump during an open-air campaign rally in Pennsylvania on July 13, 2024.

title: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE
author: Bessel van der Kolk
description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.

title: ON HER GAME
author: Christine Brennan
description: A sports columnist for USA Today profiles the ascendance of the sports and cultural icon Caitlin Clark.

author: Josh Dawsey, Tyler Pager and Isaac Arnsdorf
description: Journalists from The Wall Street Journal, The New York Times and The Washington Post examine the most recent presidential election campaign.

title: THE ANXIOUS GENERATION
author: Jonathan Haidt
description: A co-author of “The Coddling of the American Mind” looks at the mental health impacts that a phone-based life has on children.

title: DON'T BELIEVE EVERYTHING YOU THINK, EXPANDED EDITION
author: Joseph Nguyen

title: WONDER
author: R.J. Palacio
description: A boy with a facial deformity starts school. (Ages 8 to 12)

title: IMPOSSIBLE CREATURES
author: Katherine Rundell. Illustrated Ashley Mackenzie
description: A young boy is enlisted to save a place where magical creatures reside. (Ages 10 and up)

title: THE COMPLETE COOKBOOK FOR YOUNG CHEFS
author: America's Test Kitchen Kids
description: Over 100 kid-tested recipes from America's Test Kitchen. (Ages 8 and up)

title: BLOOD IN THE WATER
author: Tiffany D. Jackson
description: Kaylani McKinnon investigates a mysterious death on Martha’s Vineyard. (Ages 9 to 12)

title: GROWING HOME
author: Beth Ferry. Illustrated Terry Fan and Eric Fan
description: Talking plants, a grumpy goldfish and an inquisitive spider save the Tupper family from utter ruin. (Ages 6 to 9)

title: DRAGONS LOVE TACOS
author: Adam Rubin. Illustrated Daniel Salmieri
description: What to serve your dragon-guests. (Ages 3 to 5)

title: THE RABBIT LISTENED
author: Cori Doerrfeld
description: A rabbit consoles a young child. (Ages 3 to 5)

title: THE WONDERFUL THINGS YOU WILL BE
author: Emily Winfield Martin
description: A celebration of future possibilities. (Ages 3 to 7)

title: SEE YOU LATER, ALLIGATOR!
author: Sally Hopgood. Illustrated Emma Levey
description: A departing tortoise says goodbye to all his animal friends. (Ages 3 to 6)

title: THE MAGICAL YET
author: Angela DiTerlizzi. Illustrated Lorena Alvarez Gómez
description: A being known as the Magical Yet helps children to realize their future potential. (Ages 4 to 8)

title: THE HUNGER GAMES
author: Suzanne Collins
description: In a dystopia, a girl fights for survival on live TV. (Ages 12 and up)

title: BOYS OF TOMMEN
author: Chloe Walsh
description: In Ireland, friends at the private school Tommen College prepare for adulthood. (Ages 16 to 18)

title: THE SUMMER I TURNED PRETTY TRILOGY
author: Jenny Han
description: A beach house, summer love and enduring friendships. (Ages 12 and up)

title: THE POWERLESS TRILOGY
author: Lauren Roberts
description: A story of forbidden love between Paedyn, an Ordinary, and Kai, an Elite, in the kingdom of Ilya. (Ages 14 and up)

title: HARRY POTTER
author: J.K. Rowling
description: A wizard hones his conjuring skills in the service of fighting evil. (Ages 10 and up)

title: HOUR OF THE PUMPKIN QUEEN
author: Megan Shepherd
description: After a potion demonstration goes awry, Sally and Luna fall through a portal to Time Town. (Ages 12 and up)

title: HEARTLESS HUNTER
author: Kristen Ciccarelli
description: Rune, a witch, and Gideon, a witch-hunter, fall in love. (Ages 13 to 18)

title: NOTHING LIKE THE MOVIES
author: Lynn Painter
description: In this sequel to "Better Than the Movies," Wes tries to win back the heart of Liz. (Ages 14 and up)

title: WINGS OF STARLIGHT
author: Allison Saft
description: Clarion, the successor to the throne of Pixie Hollow, is determined to confront a monster that threatens the land. (Ages 12 to 18)

title: REBEL WITCH
author: Kristen Ciccarelli
description: Rune and Gideon must join forces to stop a sinister plot by Cressida Roseblood. (Ages 13 to 18)
